name: LourFFin - A small Sky Runner game
name_original: LourFFin - A small Sky Runner game
description:
----------This game is brought to you by VIT Bhopal Gaming Department----------

Instructions to open game:

Extract Zip File 

Open the Extracted File Folder

Open LourFfin.exe

Instructions for Playing:

a) W,A,S,D for movement

b) Mouse for camera movement 

c) Left mouse button for rope (will be used in later part of game to swing between platforms)

d) WallRunning - jump at the wall and hold left Shift for wall duration and use WASD for movement on wall

e) Space bar for Jump and Press Space again in mid air to Double Jump

======================Credits==================== Music:

1) Magnificent Presence + Empathic synchronization / Energetically Programmed Audio
2) Jimmy Fontanez - Dub Hub ♫ NO COPYRIGHT 8-bit Music
3) Alone and Peace | Beautiful Ambient Mix

Environment Assets:

Some of the Environment assets such as Rocks, Stones etc.. are taken from Unity AssetStore

1) Conifiers [BOTD]

2) Noir Marble Pack

3) Rocks and Boulders 2

4) Toby Fredson - Rocky Hills Environment

Extra Tools and Software:

Blender was one of the key tool used to design Prefabs such as Lion Statue 

Other Photo Editing Software were used to create Menu Scenes
